9/10
I love this game. Was the most fun I've ever had. Unfortunately, I can't say the same for KF2. I highly recommend, if you can find any live servers that is.
One of my favs! Always come back to this when I'm bored. Zombies, guns, blood, good choice of maps and chicken suits. What more can you want in life.
Jogo antigo, por√©m muito divertido, conheci por um amigo americano que jogava. Cl√°ssico FPS por ondas. Mais que recomendado!
Attention c'est un jeu hardcore. Le farming des niveaux de personnage est √©puisant, mais un vrai d√©fi, comme on en propose plus de nos jours

If you get this game for free (or dirt cheap) then you could have some fun with it, for a while at least, until you figure out how broken this game is. And I'm not talking about broken in a way that indicates the game's not finished, or the programmers are lazy, I'm talking about things intentionally engineered for your frustration in order to reduce your fun, unless you're just into sado-masochism. To this end, I won't even waste my time detailing all the ways this game punishes you for playing it, just take my word that it will cheat you in the absolutely dumbest ways imaginable, mostly cheating you out of fun itself. Even if you succeed in completing all waves and beat the boss, you will have accomplished nothing, and there would've been much better ways to have spent your time.

This game is a timeless classic. the maps are unique, and the weapons are fun to use. it's also challenging, even on normal. but it's all the more satisfying when you finally beat a level. and there are lots of characters to play as. the only gripe i have with this game, is the perks, more specifically leveling them up. it takes forever to do it, takes like a week to get to level 4. thankfully, there are workshop maps to turn a months worth of leveling into like an hour. yeah yeah it's cheesy, but i wanna play this game to have fun, not break my back grinding. if you wanna grind the perk levels, then ur a bigger person than me. all and all, this game is fun, it aged well. i have it a 10/10
Extremely fun and difficult horde game to play with a group of friends. Plenty of maps where run and gun or strategic hold points vary by class, skill, and RNG. Great value, if a bit dated.

Es bastante entretenido pero lo que tiene de entretenido lo es de dificil :c 
sino estas con amigos se dificulta x10 pasar cada nivel, es muy recomendable jugarlo con amigos

If you think you're good at FPS and like zombies. If you think you're a good HoE KF2 player - try the normal difficulty with long wave duration.

This game is HARDER than KF2 in terms of damage output of the zeds and harder to control recoil in comparison to the KF2's. Definitely a challenge for KF2 HoE players. :D
buy it, its worth it for as old as it may be, its just so enyojable and good

ONE IN THE PIPE.

One of the most brutally badass games I've ever played. KF2 is great and all sure, but it's no KF1. There is no other KF1. Grunge aesthetics akin to Silent Hill decor, with great heavy music while you hold your ground and decapitate or otherwise dismember anyone who dare tread on you.
Surprisingly enough in the harder difficulties, this game REALLY rewards you for mechanical skill, as well as damage/HP knowledge on enemies and weapons. That's mainly due to the extremely limited RNG involved in playing, which is a beautiful thing. It's one of the main factors this has become such a cult classic.
For the rare newbies in this year and onwards: A Hell on Earth bro, is a bro to the end.
Don't play Firebug though. lol

Que es un lewin?
Un Lewis es un jugador nuevo y frecuente, se puede ver en muchas partidas, en normal y dificil.
Generalmente los Lewis suelen ser numerosos en partidas normal.
Un Lewis no conoce la dificultad en la que juega.
Un Lewis no sabe que es un perk o clase.
El mejor amigo de un Lewis es la pistola default del juego.
Un Lewis no elige su clase, el juego lo hace.
Un Lewis compra armas que no son de su clase.
Un Lewis nunca pide dinero, cree que es pro.
Un Lewis es valiente.
Un Lewis se enfrenta cara a cara a un Fleshpound o Scrake sin miedo a morir.
Un Lewis para matar a un Fleshpound usa la pistola default, lo unico que consigue es hacerle cosquillas.
Un Lewis te cura con la soldadura.
Un Lewis se arriesga y muere por el equipo.
Un Lewis cuando escribe en el chat: rrrrrrrrrrraweasssssdwdasd
Un Lewis te sigue como un perro cuando le das dinero, aunque sea 1 euro.
Un Lewis siempre morira en la primera oleada.
Un Lewis cree que un clot es un jefe final.
Un Lewis cuando se queda sin balas, saca su knife y acribilla sin miedo a morir.
Un Lewis muere toda las oleadas.
Cuando un Lewis ve otro Lewis se hacen amigos inseparables.
Un Lewis es explorador, le gusta explorar el mapa sin miedo a morir.
Un Lewis lucha hasta el final.
Un Lewis usa la pistola default para luchar contra el patriarca, no sabe que solo le hace cosquillas.
Un Lewis siempre muere con su pistola default o su knife.
Un Lewis corre con la pistola default.
Un Lewis siempre muere por sus granadas.

Todos en alg√∫n momento fuimos un lewin
